fr.istic.project.model.module.vca

Interface VCA

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Caretaker, Module, ObservableModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JSynVCA

    public interface VCA
extends Module
    Defines the behavior of a VCA Module.
    Invariant:
    out == SIGNAL * Math.pow(10, getAmplification() + AM), MIN_AMPLIFICATION <= getAmplification() <= MAX_AMPLIFICATION
